I would climb trees or rocks on the riverbank to get to the other side.
I would swim across the river, but only if I am a strong swimmer and the river is not too deep or dangerous.
I would build a makeshift raft or canoe using materials available in the area.
I would try to find a way to build a bridge or a makeshift one using available materials.
I would look for a way to create a temporary crossing, such as a cable car or a zip line.
